Room.Name: Old Tunnel
Room.ShortDescription: You are in an abandoned section of the tunnels below the castle.
Room.LongDescription: Several great oaken doors are wedged tightly shut on the west side of the tunnel. The entry to the first one is overgrown with a gelatinous slime that seems to quiver as you get closer. A number of skeleton bones lie just below it, and several rusted pieces of armor lie on the tunnel floor. Further south you hear the trickling sound of water.
